title: Emotionally demanding workload and confrontational patients key stressors for GPs

title_detail.value: Emotionally demanding workload and confrontational patients key stressors for GPs

summary: The emotional impact of their daily workload and confrontational patients are among the key stressors for family doctors in England, reveals an analysis of feedback from general practitioners.

summary_detail.value: The emotional impact of their daily workload and confrontational patients are among the key stressors for family doctors in England, reveals an analysis of feedback from general practitioners.
